2 Points and Height

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Arc > 2 Points and Height
Shortcut: A, H
Commands: archeight | ah

Description:

Draws an arc using the start point, end point and the arc height.

Procedure:

  1. Type the arc height into the options tool bar and choose the arc direction (clockwise or counter-clockwise).
  2. Specify the start point of the arc.
  3. Specify the end point of the arc.
